attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a recent visit to Dudley Zoo with my family, I was disgusted with the size and general conditions of many of the  animals enclosures, ranging from the Orangutans down to the meerkat's. This zoo is trapped in the 30's / 40's and doesn't seem to of been improved since then. I understand some buildings are listed so cannot be modified but this is no excuse to keep animals in such conditions.
